tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE virtual_goods (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    product_name VARCHAR(255),
    description TEXT,
    price DECIMAL(10, 2),
    inventory_count INT
)

CREATE TABLE trading_transactions (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    player_id INT NOT NULL,
    goods_id INT NOT NULL,
    quantity INT NOT NULL,
    transaction_date TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE virtual_goods (
    virtual_goods_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    virtual_goods_name VARCHAR(50),
    virtual_goods_price DECIMAL,
    virtual_goods_description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE trading_transactions (
    transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    transaction_date TIMESTAMP,
    virtual_goods_id INT,
    transaction_amount DECIMAL,
    seller_id INT,
    buyer_id INT
)

CREATE TABLE player_auctions (
    auction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    auction_start_date TIMESTAMP,
    auction_end_date TIMESTAMP,
    virtual_goods_id INT,
    starting_price DECIMAL,
    current_highest_bid DECIMAL,
    bidder_id INT
)

CREATE TABLE trading_transactions (
    id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY,
    transaction_id VARCHAR(50),
    buyer_id INTEGER,
    seller_id INTEGER,
    goods_id INTEGER,
    transaction_date TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE player_auctions (
    id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY,
    auction_id VARCHAR(50),
    player_id INTEGER,
    goods_id INTEGER,
    starting_price DECIMAL(10, 2),
    end_date TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE users (
    id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY,
    username VARCHAR(50),
    email VARCHAR(255),
    password VARCHAR(255),
    is_admin BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE transactions (
    transaction_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    player_id INT NOT NULL,
    goods_id INT NOT NULL,
    quantity INT NOT NULL,
    transaction_date TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE auctions (
    auction_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    goods_id INT NOT NULL,
    starting_price DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL,
    current_bid DECIMAL(10, 2),
    auction_end_date TIMESTAMP
);
